title: Delay on Circle Line due to train fault

title_translations.ms: Kelewatan di Laluan Bulat kerana kerosakan tren
title_translations.ta: ரயில் பழுது காரணமாக வட்டப் பாதையில் தாமதம்

updates.text: [CCL] CLEARED: Normal service resumed. All available trains launched for service and at maximum capacity.
[CCL] CLEARED: Train services from #Mounbatten towards #PayaLebar are now operating normally.
[CCL]: Estimate 15 mins additional travelling time between #Mounbatten to #PayaLebar due to train fault. Free Bus services provided.
Expect 20 mins delay on Circle Line Between Mounbaten to Paya Lebar due to train fault
